text: She has had a fractious relationship with her sisters in recent times, falling out after being called the'least interesting to look at '. And Kourtney Kardashian seemed to be taking notes from Kim's signature style as she stepped out wearing a skintight black bodysuit for a tennis session in Los Angeles on Monday. Joined by her girl pals, the television personality, 39, cut a sporty figure in the Adidas number which showcased her enviably toned - physique as she filmed scenes for the family's hit reality show.
